title: Multiple Linear Regression Calculator – OLS, ANOVA, Predictions

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: OLS solution: \( \boldsymbol{\beta} = (X'X)^{-1} X' y \) where X is n×(k+1) including the intercept column of 1s, and y is n×1. Residuals: \( e = y - X\beta \) SSE: \( \text{SSE} = e'e \) (residual sum of squares) SST: \( \text{SST} = \sum (y_i - \bar{y})^2 \) SSR: \( \text{SSR} = \text{SST} - \text{SSE} \)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
